mapper.select: SELECT * from `km_product` order by `sold` desc limit 5;
SELECT * from `km_product` order by `hit` desc limit 8;
SELECT * from `km_product` order by `score` desc limit 8;
SELECT * from `km_product` order by `rdate` desc limit 8;
SELECT * from `km_product` order by `discount` desc limit 8;
select a.*, b.`prodName`, b.`thumb1`, b.`descript`, b.`prodCate1`, b.`prodCate2` from `km_product_cart` as a join `km_product` as b on a.prodNo=b.prodNo where `cartNo` in (#{cartNo});
select count(`prodNo`) from `km_product` WHERE prodCate1=#{cate1} AND prodCate2=#{cate2};
